definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: confidence Ez Eze 29:16—cstr. [[מִבְטַח]] Pr 14:26 + 2 t.; sf. [[מִבְטַהִי]] Job 31:24 + 6 t. (dag. implicit); [[מִבְטֶחָם]] Je 48:13; [[מִבְטֶחָהַ]] Pr 21:22; pl. [[מִבְטַחִים]] Is 32:18; [[מִבְטָחַיִח]] Je 2:37; —
the act of confiding Pr 21:22, Pr 22:19, Pr 25:19.
the object of confidence Job 8:14, Job 18:14, Job 31:24, Ps 40:5, Ps 65:6, Ps 71:5, Je 2:37, Je 17:7, Je 48:13, Ez Eze 29:16.
the state of confidence, security Pr 14:26, Is 32:18.
